## m3 Markdown Badges

**A Material You inspired markdown badge collection.**

[![ref-repo]](https://github.com/ziadOUA/m3-Markdown-Badges)
[![ref-official-doc]](https://github.com/ziadOUA/m3-Markdown-Badges?tab=readme-ov-file#how-to-use)
![ref-static-badge]

> [!Tip]
> This project contains a lot of static badges, detailed static badge links can be found in the repository [m3-Markdown-Badges](https://github.com/ziadOUA/m3-Markdown-Badges?tab=readme-ov-file#static-badges).

### Parameters

<details >
<summary><small>Click to show/close parameters</small></summary><p></p>

| Name | Type | Required | Default | Description | More Description |
| -------------------- | -------------------- | ------------------------ | ----------------------- | --------------------------- | ------------------------------- |
| ![ref-params] | | | | | |
| `type` | `string` | `true` |  | Badge type | Supported: `stars` `issues`. |
| `hue` | `number` | `true` |  | Hue | Bettween `1` and `12`. |
| `tint` | `number` | `true` |  | Tint | Bettween `1` and `3`. |
| `owner` | `string` | `true` |  | Github username |  |
| `repo` | `string` | `true` |  | Github repository name |  |

</details>

```txt
https://m3-markdown-badges.vercel.app/{type}/{hue}/{tint}/{owner}/{repo}
```

<p align="right"><a href="#readme-top"><img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/Back%20to%20top-555555?style=for-the-badge"></a></p>

### Examples

#### Dynamic badges

```markdown
<!-- ziadOUA/m3-Markdown-Badges -->
![Github Stars](https://m3-markdown-badges.vercel.app/stars/1/2/ziadOUA/m3-Markdown-Badges)
```

<div>
  <img src="https://m3-markdown-badges.vercel.app/stars/1/2/ziadOUA/m3-Markdown-Badges" alt="Github Stars" />
  <img src="https://m3-markdown-badges.vercel.app/issues/1/2/ziadOUA/m3-Markdown-Badges" alt="Github Issues" />
</div>

#### Static badges

```markdown
![Github](https://ziadoua.github.io/m3-Markdown-Badges/badges/Github/github2.svg)
```

<div>
  <img src="https://ziadoua.github.io/m3-Markdown-Badges/badges/Github/github2.svg" alt="Github" />
  <img src="https://ziadoua.github.io/m3-Markdown-Badges/badges/TypeScript/typescript2.svg" alt="TypeScript" />
  <img src="https://ziadoua.github.io/m3-Markdown-Badges/badges/Ko-fi/ko-fi2.svg" alt="Ko-fi" />
  <img src="https://ziadoua.github.io/m3-Markdown-Badges/badges/LicenceMIT/licencemit2.svg" alt="Licence MIT" />
  <img src="https://ziadoua.github.io/m3-Markdown-Badges/badges/NodeJS/nodejs2.svg" alt="NodeJS" />
  <img src="https://ziadoua.github.io/m3-Markdown-Badges/badges/npm/npm2.svg" alt="npm" />
  <img src="https://ziadoua.github.io/m3-Markdown-Badges/badges/Markdown/markdown2.svg" alt="Markdown" />
  <img src="https://ziadoua.github.io/m3-Markdown-Badges/badges/ViteJS/vitejs2.svg" alt="ViteJS" />
</div>
